description.value:
To better emulate the might of dragons, you have made a practice of collecting portions of the power that flows through you, sequestering them within your very being until the time is right to make a demonstration.
    You have a Spiritual Hoard, which resets to 0 whenever you finish a long rest. Before applying the effects of a roll to determine healing given to a creature or damage dealt to a genuine adversary, you can choose to hoard a single rolled die. Add that die’s result to your Spiritual Hoard, and then set the die to a 1. The affected die does not count towards effects that trigger upon rolling one or more of a specific number, such as Eikonic Numbers or Miracles.
    While the total of your Spiritual Hoard equals or exceeds 25, you can subtract 25 from it to trigger a Miracle as a non-action on your turn.
